originalText.text: Molly Penn helped our board and staff elevate our thinking and approach to strategic planning.  She worked with leadership to co-create a high engagement approach that involved community stakeholders in all sectors to help us increase our impact and focus.  Molly is a substantive creative thinking and she is a delight to work with.  She brings decades of experience and national contacts and perspective to her work. She listens, she pays attention to who is around the table and who is not. We continue to work with Molly when we need help.  Without hesitation I highly recommend Molly and Penn Creative Strategy.  Ann Coffey, CEO, Center for Nonprofit Excellence

originalText.text: I had the great fortune to work with Molly Penn of PENN Creative Strategy this past month. She hired my company to help with a number of graphic design projects. Working with Molly was a pleasure because she was both clear about her ideas and open to new ones. She has excellent communication and interpersonal skills. She understands the value of good presentation, and how it can impact and create engagement.  Additionally, her strategic skills were apparent with each project we collaborated on. She always had firm ideas for the direction she was heading and why she wanted certain components included in the designs. For me she was an ideal client and I hope that Molly and I can collaborate on many more projects together. If you are a non-profit or a foundation looking for a strategic business consultant, I highly recommend you contact Molly.

originalText.text: I've worked with lots of strategic planners -- Molly is among the very best. Whip smart. Flexible, adaptive and empathetic, but appropriately challenging when she needs to be. She excels at turning obstacles into creative opportunities. She kept us honest and on track. Beyond  the strategic plan, itself, we are stronger as an organization for having worked with Molly. Ten stars.

originalText.text:
The Lenfest Institute worked with Molly Penn and the team from Penn Creative Strategies as part of our Lenfest News Philanthropy Network, a training program for fundraisers in journalism. Molly is leading three separate cohorts of journalists in workshops teaching the fundamentals of grant writing.

Molly and her team have created thoughtful, compelling, and interactive workshops that have engaged a diverse array of participants. Molly has met all of our deadlines and been tremendously flexible with us as the scope of the project expanded. When we received unexpectedly high interest in the course, Molly responded quickly and effectively to accommodate additional participants.

The grant writing course that Molly and the team have designed is comprehensive and nuanced, but accessible for beginners. It walks participants through every step of the grant writing process — from research and relationship building to stewardship and communication. In addition to demonstrating a deep understanding of the essential nonprofit funding models, Molly has created an interactive and participatory learning environment despite the limitations of a virtual environment. They’ve made sure the course is accessible to all participants, no matter their experience or technological capacity.

originalText.text: We had an AMAZING 1/2 day retreat with Molly & Sofia.  They are exceptional facilitators and really helped our team have those tough conversations and develop ideas for the future of our DEIA work.  The group left energized, happy and in a much more positive space when it comes to where we're headed from here!  On behalf of the entire DEI Committee here at Life's WORC .... THANK YOU!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
